name: Stealth Maxi Dress- Black
description:
Sexy summer maxi dress with neckline design detail. Dress is up with a belt and bright accessories, or wear it with minimun styling for a casual chic look! 

- 100% premium cotton 
- Light weight and casual fit.
- Plunging back with a center pleat 
- Buttons detail in the back for waist fit adjustment
- Beautifully hand crafted with passion and love in New York City


Model is 5ft 10" (178cm) wearing a size 2-4.

Size Guide: 
Size 2-4 -> Bust 33"-34", Waist 25"-26", Hip 35"-36"

Size 6-8 -> Bust 35"-36", Waist 27"-28, Hip 37"-38" 

Size 10-12 -> Bust 37"-38", Waist 29"-31", Hip 39-41"

Shipping worldwide!! Enjoy Free Shipping in the US!! Estimated shipping in 7-10 business 
days.

*Custom- We are able to make this dress in other colours not found here for an additional $10-$ 20(as prices of fabric varies) Please write to us before placing an order.

name: Slim Fit Mens Button Up Shirt (long sleeves) - White/Black
description:
Subtle and modern shirt with collar design detail. Stay classic with a fashionable twist! 

*Available in White or Black*
- Slim fit 
- 100% premium cotton 
- Hidden buttons for a clean, chic look! 
- Colour block deatil on mandarin collar. Classic with a twist! 
- Long sleeves with angled cuff detail.
- Beautifully hand crafted with passion and love in New York City

Model is wearing a size S in white.

Size Guide: 
The numbers indicates chest size. For example size Small is to fit a chest size 36-38 inches and so on

*Shipping worldwide!! Enjoy Free Shipping in the US!! Estimated shipping time 7-10 business days

**Customization available:
We can add additional back seams for a even more tailored fit. We can also make this in another color. Please contact us before placing an order.
